item.title: Facebook Contact Forms with AJAX and PHP
item.description: While working today, I was having an issue finding information on how to add a lead capture form on our Facebook Page. Luckily I stumbled across this amazing post! Submitting a Contact Form via AJAX From Your Facebook Page However, this solution didn’t work out of the box so I had to pair it with PHP. The Facebook Code Both of these pieces of code should be placed on your Static HTML Page/Tab
